DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of a reference identifier for a specific adverse event within a patient record.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Details Reference Object Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole._Something referred to; the object of a reference.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.

Property.preferredDefinition: Something referred to; the object of a reference.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

Concepts.definition: Something referred to; the object of a reference.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/1/11 Released as part of Lymphoma Enterprise Architecture Data System (LEADS) model cleanup.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._Something referred to; the object of a reference._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.
